sucre.en: Hello, Dino is talking to you...

sucre.es: Aquí descubrimos cuánto sabes y cuánto has aprendido. Sorprende a todos respondiendo las preguntas.
sucre.qu: Kaypi descubreyku mayk'ata yachanki, mayk'atataq yachanki kunan, tapu kuykunata kutichispa sapa runakunata musphachiy
sucre.en: Here we discover how much you know and how much you have learned. Surprise everyone by answering the questions.
